thread.title: Taylor Swift and Calvin Harris reportedly split [Video]
thread.title_full: Taylor Swift and Calvin Harris reportedly split [Video]

title: Taylor Swift and Calvin Harris reportedly split [Video]
text:
Taylor Swift and Calvin Harris reportedly split First posted: Monday, October 12, 2015 03:14 PM EDT | Updated: Calvin Harris is 'insanely happy' with Taylor Swift 
Taylor Swift’s relationship with boyfriend Calvin Harris may not have a happy ending because apparently Calvin Harris has already got that covered. 
Yep, crazy rumors are swirling that T-Swift broke it off with her DJ bf because he was visiting Thai massage parlors too much and getting more than just massages. 
Now this is just a rumor, but if it turns out to be true, we can expect Swift's next album to be complete fire revealing Calvin’s dirty secrets. 
Video provided by Celeb TV Sponsored Links
